summary: This is an email chain from November 2021 regarding the upcoming Finest Foundation Awards ceremony on November 9, 2021. It congratulates two investigators from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force for their work on the Epstein case and informs them of the award details.

persons.name: Det
persons.context: One of the investigators from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force being recognized with a Finest Foundation Award for work on the Epstein case.

persons.name: Detective
persons.context: A detective to be copied on the RSVP for the Finest Foundation Awards ceremony.

connections.description: Both are investigators on the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force who worked on the Epstein case and are being recognized together.

events.title: Finest Foundation Awards Ceremony
events.description: An awards ceremony where investigators from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force are recognized for their work on the Epstein case.

keyFacts: Two investigators, an NYPD Detective (Det) and an FBI Special Agent (SA), are being awarded for their work on the Epstein case by the Finest Foundation.
The awards ceremony is scheduled for November 9, 2021, at the 1 PP Auditorium.
The investigators are part of the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force.
The email chain demonstrates ongoing recognition for law enforcement work on the Epstein investigation years after the main events.
